description: Configures a store to sync secrets using BeyondTrust Password Safe.

apiKey.description: APIKey If not provided then ClientID/ClientSecret become required.

certificate.description: Certificate (cert.pem) for use when authenticating with an OAuth client Id using a Client Certificate.

certificateKey.description: Certificate private key (key.pem). For use when authenticating with an OAuth client Id

clientId.description: ClientID is the API OAuth Client ID.

clientSecret.description: ClientSecret is the API OAuth Client Secret.
